title: LI sermons preached by the Reverend Dr. Mark Frank ... being a course of sermons, beginning at Advent, and so continued through the festivals : to which is added a sermon preached at St. Pauls Cross, in the year forty-one, and then commanded to be printed by King Charles the First.
author: Frank, Mark, 1613-1664.
publicationStmtPublisher: Printed by Andrew Clark for John Martyn, Henry Brome, and Richard Chiswell ...,
